notes:
**Note 1:**  Ignore intraluminal extension to adjacent segment(s) of colon/rectum or to the ileum from the cecum; code depth of invasion or extracolonic spread as indicated.

**Note 2:** Terminology such as "Transmural, NOS" and  "Extension through the wall, NOS" typically means that the tumor has invaded the muscularis propria but has not necessarily invaded the entire thickness of the wall.
